Title: Dawood’s nephew gets married under police watch
Content: Wanted fugitive Dawood Ibrahim Kaskar’s nephew Alishah Parkar got married and then held a lavish reception on Wednesday, with the festivities being closely watched by the Mumbai police. Sources said t
Author: Special Correspondent
